name: MouseWars Party
description:
MouseWars is a real time multiplayer cursors war game. The cursors have to fight until only one remains.

Features:


  • Plug multiple USB mice and start an instant cursors battlefield
  • Play online with your friends or practice with bots
  • Two game modes: All vs all and Team vs team
  • Two score types: Deathmatch and Survival
  • 9 types of attacks
  • Up to 8 players per room
  • In-game chat
  • Servers for South America, North America and Europe

MouseWars Party is a Desktop version of the game that includes an exclusive local multiplayer mode, as well as the classic online game (which is currently available online for free).
